Package it.polimi.ingsw.View

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Observable<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.View.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<Message>
Direct Known Subclasses:
RemoteView
public abstract class View
extends Observable<Message>
implements Observer<Message>
View is the abstract view for the MVC pattern. It's an Observable for the Controller. Messages are read in the SocketClientConnection that notifies the message receiver object in the RemoteView that trigger each method of the View. Each Message has Player equals to null because the Client doesn't know his reference, so the View set the Player field (each View has a single Player as attribute).
